txt.en: A different visual appearance for your Orc Reaver.  A pale-skinned Moria Orc covered in fiery scars wearing a leather tunic. The armour is dyed orange.
Black Mordor Reaver Horned Chieftain Orc Appearance
A different visual appearance for your Orc Reaver: a black-skinned Mordor reaver chieftain wearing very heavy armour and horned helm.
